name: Lights Out & Youtube Center Compatibility Fix
description: By default, the settings popup of Youtube Center (<abbr title="Youtube Center">YTC</abbr>) is all white and clashes quite severely with the dark colors of the "Youtube - Lights Out - A Dark Youtube Theme" (<abbr title="Youtube - Lights Out - A Dark Youtube Theme">YLO Theme</abbr>) userstyle. This userstyle applies the main and secondary colors of the <abbr title="Youtube - Lights Out - A Dark Youtube Theme">YLO Theme</abbr> userstyle to the settings popup of <abbr title="Youtube Center">YTC</abbr>, bringing the clashing light colors on dark colors conflict to a rightful end.
